description: Try our easy to follow Rigatoni with Tofu & Broccoli Pesto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pesto pasta,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Tofu
name: Rigatoni with Tofu & Broccoli Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup basil leaves (plus extra to serve)
0.25 cup lemon, juiced and rind finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Process 600g broccoli florets, 1/2 cup basil leaves, 80g toasted pine nuts, 1 crushed garlic clove, 2 tsp grated lemon rind, 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil and 1 cup grated parmesan in a food processor until finely chopped. Set aside.
Cut 250g tofu into cubes. Heat 2 tbs olive oil in a nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Cook tofu, turning often, or until golden. Remove using a slotted spoon and drain on paper towel.

Cook quinoa according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving 1/2 cup of the cooking liquid. Return pasta and cooking liquid to the pan over medium heat. Add broccoli mixture and stir for 1â€“2 minutes or until well combined. Serve pasta with tofu and basil leaves.
